%%Recovery Process Flow
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Normal_Operations
    Normal_Operations --> Incident_Detection: Event Detected
    Incident_Detection --> Impact_Assessment
    Impact_Assessment --> Minor_Disruption
    Impact_Assessment --> Major_Disruption
    Impact_Assessment --> Disaster
    Minor_Disruption --> Recovery_Procedures
    Major_Disruption --> DR_Plan_Activation
    Disaster --> BC_Plan_Activation
    Recovery_Procedures --> Normal_Operations
    DR_Plan_Activation --> Recovery_Procedures
    BC_Plan_Activation --> Alternative_Site_Activation
    Alternative_Site_Activation --> Normal_Operations
